details: Online booking for reselling products, all the generated data integrated with the backend. Stripe payment method implemented in this project
Buyers and sellers are controlled with a private route, specific user route, and JWT token
Technologies used are MongoDB, React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, and firebase authentication
Responsive website, where customers can review from the service details page and can see his/her own review as well as another customer review for individual service
Customers' own reviews are displayed in a specific route, and the customer can modify it. Data is stored in the backend and protected by a JWT token
MongoDB, React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, and firebase authentication systems like Email Password, Google, and GitHub login integrated in this project
An online tutorial website where react routing system is the main focus
Build with React, React Bootstrap, Bootstrap, and Firebase authentication systems like Google, GitHub, and Email login implemented
Packages like React Router, React Icons, React Hot Toast, and React to Print were used in this project
